item.title: [Delta] Problem with Welcome Message
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

Hello i add an Welcome Message in my server and for different playerRight and 1 for a playername

[code]public void Welcomessage() {

if (playerRights == 0)
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Server Owner:King Charles,King Will And King Greg”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Server Owner:King Charles,King Will And King Greg”);
sM(“You are a Moderator help players and stay active!”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Server Owner:King Charles,King Will And King Greg”);
sM(“You are an Administator, dont abuse and help players”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (playerRights == 3)
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Server Owner:King Charles,King Will And King Greg”);
sM(“You are Co-Owner you have almost all the power in you’re hand!”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“King Charles”))
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us.”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Welcome back King Charles, keep coding the server.”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“king will”))
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us.”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Welcome back King Will, Owner of Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“king greg”))
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us.”);
sM(“Please ::Donate For Access to Donator Island!”);
sM(“Welcome back King Greg, Owner of Godz Corruption!”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
else if (donator == 1)
{
sM(“Welcome to Godz Corruption”);
sM(“Use ::help for starting, Read ::rules, ::info ::modinfo”);
sM(“Forums:”);
sM(“Updates:”);
sM(“More Coming Soon use ::suggest command to help us”);
sM(“Server Owner:King Charles,King Will And King Greg”);
sM(“Thank for donation + playerName + you can use donator portal!”);
sM(“There are currently " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online!”);
}
}[/code]

King Charles are PlayerRights 3 and i get the message for playerRight 3 but i want to get the message for him
Thank for Help
